Package pokerapp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayerVisitor
    Enables clients to visit the various Player subclasses.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Provides a base class for spring-initialised application entry points.
    Card
    creates cards for the poker app
    ComputerPlayer  
    Dealer
    Dealer for pokerapp deals and replaces cards
    Deck
    builds a deck of cards for pokerapp and allows operations on the deck.
    GameResult
    Represents the final state of a game of poker: who won and why.
    Hand
    Creates hands from cards and allows ranking, sorting, exchanging and printing of those hands
    HandFactory
    Instantiates valid passed cards and creates hand instances from them.
    HighToLowCardComparator
    Compares two cards and determines which one is higher based on the rank (ignores suit)
    HistoryTable
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    InteractivePlayer  
    MultiplePlayerNoTieGameResult
    Represents the (most common) outcome where a single player has won when many (>2) were playing.
    Player  
    Players
    Holds players for the poker app, is able to compare to pick a winning player
    PokerGame
    Represents a single game of poker, including the Dealer and all the players, with their hands.
    SimpleGameResult
    Represents the outcome of a win/lose game of poker between two players
    Suit
    Describes suits (in correct order which is clubs, diamonds, hearts, spades) for pokerapp
    TiedSimpleGameResult
    Encapsulates a tied game between two players
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rank
    Describes ranks, assigns each rank name a value, and allows printing to screen of the rank - it was decided that 10 is 10, Jack is J, King K, Queen Q and Ace A or 1
